definitions.definition: A male given name from Ancient Greek, notably born by St. Nicholas of Myre , on whom Father Christmas is based .
A surname originating as a patronymic .
An unincorporated community in Fluvanna County , Virginia , United States .
A settlement on Saint Croix , United States Virgin Islands .
